name: Green Reaper (itch)
description:
The Green Reaper spends his ethereal nights harvesting the souls of plants that died during the day. Buy upgrades for your gear and pay for new plants to die and arrive in your field. 

This game was made as a part of the U of U GameCraft October Jam. The theme was “harvest.”

Controls:

WASD: Move 

Mouse + Click: Harvest

Upgrades: 

Movement Speed,  

Attack Damage,  

Attack speed, 

Attack Range

Plants: 

Corn: Yellow = $1, Blue = $2, Red = $3) 

Ghost Pepper: Movement Speed Bonus

FrankenZini: Attack Speed Bonus

Exploding Pumpkin: Harvests everything in a radius
